original_title: Yo Gabba Gabba!: The Dancey Dance Bunch
overview: The Dancey Dance Bunch is the DVD launch of Yo Gabba Gabba!. The DVD includes four episodes: "Friends," "Eat," "Dance," and "Happy" plus special features. Hosted by DJ Lance Rock, Yo Gabba Gabba! infuses retro-style and modern-day music to teach simple life lessons through a vibrant world of puppet characters who play and dance when they hear the magic wordsâ€¦ "Yo Gabba Gabba!"
title: Yo Gabba Gabba!: The Dancey Dance Bunch
